name: #10 Mehen Umbyrphrael
description:
Mehen Umbyrphrael

Race: Dragonborn

Subraces and Variants:
Draconic Ancestry: Brass

Physical Characteristics:
Age: 103 years
Height: 7'8"
Weight: 217 lbs.
Eyes: Gold
Scales: See Ancestry

Gender: Unknown
Class: Wizard
Arcane Tradition: School of Evocation
Background: Aristocrat
Occupation: Entertainer

Trait: I'm haunted by memories of war. I can't get the images of violence out of my mind.
Ideal: Independence. When people follow orders blindly, they embrace a kind of tyranny. (Chaotic)
Bond: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
Flaw: I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.

Description:
Appearance: Braided beard or hair
High Ability: Constitution-hardy, hale, healthy
Low Ability: Strength-feeble, scrawny
Talent: Great at solving puzzles
Mannerism: Stares into the distance
Interaction Trait: Ponderous
Values: Knowledge (Neutral), Dedicated to fulfilling a personal life goal
Flaw or Secret: Has a powerful enemy
